ns2:Service.description: The caGrid Federated Query Infrastructure provides a mechanism to perform basic distributed aggregations and joins of queries over multiple data services.
ns2:Service.name: FederatedQueryProcessor

ns2:Operation.description: Executes the given DCQL query and returns the results as standard data service results.
ns2:Operation.name: executeAndAggregateResults

ns2:Fault.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns2:Fault.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns2:Operation.description: Executes the specified DCQL query, blocking until completion.
ns2:Operation.name: execute

ns2:Fault.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns2:Fault.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns2:Operation.description: Executes the specified DCQL query, and returns a reference to the query result resource.
ns2:Operation.name: executeAsynchronously

ns2:Operation.description: Returns the results of the query managed by this resource
ns2:Operation.name: getResults

ns2:Fault.description: Indicates the query has not yet completed.
ns2:Fault.name: ProcessingNotCompleteFault

ns2:Fault.description: Indicates an error occured processing the query.
ns2:Fault.name: FederatedQueryProcessingFault

ns2:Operation.description: Indicates whether or not the query processing is complete; until this is true, getResults cannot be excecuted.
ns2:Operation.name: isProcessingComplete

ns2:Operation.description: Destroys this resource and its corresponding query results (standard ws-lifetime operation).
ns2:Operation.name: Destroy

ns2:Operation.description: Schedules this destruction of this resource (standard ws-lifetime operation).
ns2:Operation.name: SetTerminationTime

ns2:ContextProperty.description: The current time as believed by this service; should be consulted before setting a termnination time (standard ws-lifetime property).
ns2:ContextProperty.name: {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/2004/06/wsrf-WS-ResourceLifetime-1.2-draft-01.xsd}CurrentTime

ns2:ContextProperty.description: The scheduled termination time of this resource (standard ws-lifetime property)
ns2:ContextProperty.name: {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsrf/2004/06/wsrf-WS-ResourceLifetime-1.2-draft-01.xsd}TerminationTime

ns13:SemanticMetadata.conceptDefinition: A service available on a system that coordinates resources that are not subject to central control, using open, general purpose protocols and interfaces to deliver nontrivial qualities of services.

ns40:SemanticMetadata.conceptDefinition: Services that are needed to maintain the running of a grid, including monitoring and discovery service, security management service (authentication and authorization), identifier naming and resolution service, query and federated query service, and workflow management service.
